import React,{useState}from"react";import{useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import SlideUpModal from"../PopUp/SlideUpModal";import BlueUderLinedLink from"../Texts/BlueUderLinedLink";import AddressPopup from"./AddressPopup";var locationIconProps={name:"location-red",slot:"",class:"zoom12",styleProps:{zoom:1.8}};const editPencil={name:"pencil",slot:"",class:"lastIcon blueStroke"};const addLocationIconProps={name:"add-location",slot:""//class: "slotStart",
};const AddressLink=_ref=>{let{setAddress,linkClassName,value,attributes,disabled,openPopup}=_ref;let history=useHistory();const[showModal,setshowModal]=useState(false);const[address,setaddress]=useState(value);function openAddressDetails(){setshowModal(true);}function handleAddressDetails(flag,data,name){setshowModal(false);if(flag==="add")history.push("/addAddress");else if(flag==="edit"){var value={contact:data,booking:data.details,isContainerEdit:true,bookTruck:attributes};history.push("/addAddress",value);}else if(flag==="select")setaddress(data);setAddress(name,data);}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(SlideUpModal,{showModal:showModal,openOrCloseModal:modalState=>setshowModal(modalState),content:/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(AddressPopup,{clickFunc:handleAddressDetails})}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{hidden:address.consigneeContactName===undefined},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(BlueUderLinedLink,{label:(address.addressNickname||"")+" "+address.consigneeContactName+" "+address.consigneeContactNumber+" "+address.dropAddress,leftIcon:locationIconProps,onTap:()=>setshowModal(openPopup),className:"flexStart ",labelCLassName:"location-selected",rightIcon:!disabled?editPencil:"",rightIconTap:()=>handleAddressDetails("edit",address,"droplocation")})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{hidden:address.consigneeContactName},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(BlueUderLinedLink,{label:"Add drop locationss",leftIcon:addLocationIconProps,onTap:()=>setshowModal(true),className:linkClassName})));};export default AddressLink;
